trans-unit.source: This API allows you to get consumption data for an Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: This API allows you to get consumption data for an Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: It returns all of the usage data incurred on an Azure subscription and NOT JUST the usage data that was considered for billing – this might include any usage at the end of the billing cycle that was discarded due to lateness.
trans-unit.target: It returns all of the usage data incurred on an Azure subscription and NOT JUST the usage data that was considered for billing – this might include any usage at the end of the billing cycle that was discarded due to lateness.

trans-unit.source: Please see the question titled ‘What is the difference between Usage Time and Reported Time?’
trans-unit.target: Please see the question titled ‘What is the difference between Usage Time and Reported Time?’

trans-unit.source: in the <embeddedLabel>Frequently Asked Questions</embeddedLabel> section of the <link xlink:href="5f08f5c4-aa7d-4c32-a767-2457cff1c2a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get consumption data for a particular Azure subscription</link> article for more details.
trans-unit.target: in the <embeddedLabel>Frequently Asked Questions</embeddedLabel> section of the <link xlink:href="5f08f5c4-aa7d-4c32-a767-2457cff1c2a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get consumption data for a particular Azure subscription</link> article for more details.

trans-unit.source: The following information is common to all tasks that you might perform related to getting usage details:
trans-unit.target: The following information is common to all tasks that you might perform related to getting usage details:

trans-unit.source: Replace {subscription-Id} in the request URI with your subscription identifier.
trans-unit.target: Replace {subscription-Id} in the request URI with your subscription identifier.

trans-unit.source: Replace {api-version} in the request URI with <embeddedLabel>2015-06-01-preview</embeddedLabel>
trans-unit.target: Replace {api-version} in the request URI with <embeddedLabel>2015-06-01-preview</embeddedLabel>

trans-unit.source: Set the Content-Type request header to <embeddedLabel>application/json</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the Content-Type request header to <embeddedLabel>application/json</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Set the Authorization request header to an OAuth bearer token formatted as a JSON Web Token, which you obtain from Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Set the Authorization request header to an OAuth bearer token formatted as a JSON Web Token, which you obtain from Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can do the following with the Resource Usage API:
trans-unit.target: You can do the following with the Resource Usage API:
